alert.note: Alert for Carter (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 7:54AM MDT until July 05 at 8:15AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CARTER COUNTY... At 754 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bowman to 9 miles west of Ladner to near West Short Pines to 12 miles northeast of Alzada, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Capitol. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
